DOC.brief_title: Humalog® Mix50/50 ( tm ) Treatment Gestational Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Controlling hyperglycemia pregnancy decrease risk adverse neonatal maternal outcome . Not must fast glucose normalized , clinical evidence also indicate control postprandial hyperglycemia significantly reduce risk adverse neonatal maternal outcome . Standard therapy achieve near-normal glycemia gestational diabetes involves combine intermediate-acting basal ( NPH ) insulin rapid-acting insulin ( insulin lispro ) , thereby require 6 daily injection . Premixed Humalog® Mix50/50TM potential advantage combination rapid-acting plus NPH insulin involve few injection , injection associate mealtime . The potential downside premixed formulation nocturnal hypoglycemia associate time lag dinner breakfast dose . This study evaluate efficacy safety Humalog® Mix50/50TM compare Humalog® plus Humulin N® insulin treatment insulin-requiring patient gestational diabetes mellitus , monitor glucose control , intrauterine growth assess pregnancy outcome .
